FuncDef: The display license esn command displays the equipment serial number (ESN) of a device.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When license-controlled function items are required, apply for a license file.
To apply for a license file, run the display license esn command to view the ESN of the current device.
The ESN of the device must be the same as the value of the ESN field in the license file. Otherwise, the new license file cannot be activated.
Prerequisites
The ESN, which is the unique identifier of a device component (for example, a main control board and an interface board), must be obtained and specified before you apply for a license file.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
